about_the_game:
Earth is locked into a climatic death spiral from which there is no escape, humanity having squandered the resources essential to rehabilitating their home.

One slender hope remains: acquiring resources from offworld. The only viable location: Mars. The Mars Project was your brainchild. It is a one-way trip, and the extraction effort has no margin for error.

And then it all goes wrong.

A shipboard disaster jettisons your cryopod and you are presumed lost. Awakening years later on the Martian surface you find your project team has carried on without you, as best they could. On Earth humanity is now hanging on by its cuticles, huddled in the dwindling handful of population centers that remain.

You have been asleep for too long and so much has changed. A slip of 0.1% productivity could be a death blow to millions - or our entire species. You can fix this, there is still time, but it is no longer your project. Mars is a strange land and you are a stranger in it. Utilizing your training, skills and hypercompetence you will get to know this ragtag Martian society, earn their trust, and repair the effort to save humanity. In doing so you will need to confront hard truths about yourself, truths that have helped you to become the person you are, but may be a liability on this strange world that wants you dead, among people who owe you nothing.

As Jedda you must descend into the world of those who keep Mars running, those who lord over them, and those who fight against an establishment they no longer believe in. Making friends, forging alliances and repairing the machine of the Mars Project from the ground up while pursued by forces that would see you stopped, you are driven by a determination to one day return home to a world that still has a future. For yourself, and for your daughter.

Red Echo is an epic, story-driven third person shooter from Pacenlife Games that blends deadly combat and stealth with survival, puzzle solving, meaningful dialog choices and a compelling and original story brought to life through powerful performances. In Red Echo, Mars is an immersive game world that feels plausible, real and alive.

Explore the Martian wilderness, kitbashed human habitations, labyrinthine underground cave systems and unique societies. Shape your thrilling story-line to determine the fate of humanity.

Features
Embark on an incredible journey - survive, negotiate, battle and befriend your way across the freezing, radioactive, surprising and beautiful landscapes of the red planet.

Experience Sandbox Survival - rad-shielding and oxygen are as vital as reliable alliances and a sturdy sidearm.
A beautiful, hostile world - brought to life with stunning day / night cycles and dynamic weather.
Deadly combat and stealth - scavenge and craft in the field to customize your arsenal of hand-made weaponry, and engage foes in thrilling tactical combat.
Difficult choices determine the fate of friends, cities and the Earth itself - not all will survive; your decisions have consequences in a tense and moving storyline that offers massive replayability.






● Explore the Martian terrain in a survival manner, making sure you have enough oxygen to continue your journey across the Martian frontier. You must avoid being overcome by the environment and the secrets that lie within Mars, or from hostiles who oppose your intentions.


● Explore the world in whichever direction you choose. Explore on foot...but you will be limited to the distance you can travel. Use a buggy to get further afield...but your traversal will be slow. Dynamically climb over the rocky slopes and canyons...but beware what lies beneath.
